sentence.Network_en: Used to indicate that something is exceptionally solid, e . g . an anchor, a hold . See also bombproof.
sentence.Network_cn: 常用来表示一个固定点或把手点非常坚固.

means.word_mean: 1. a chamber (often underground) reinforced against bombing and provided with food and living facilities; used during air raids
1. able to resist the explosive force of bombs and shells;

auth_sentence.content: He explained that despite looking "bombproof", they were sensitive creatures with wonderful characters.
